docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Endpoint ‘https://boascan.io/getaddresssummary?address=GHSDNF……' HTTP Method: GET Returns Address, No. of Transactions, Total Received, Total Sent, Freezing Total Amount, Reward Total Amount, Final Balance of Address Query String Explanation Example address public address GDNODE5JKEW8765DHGJASYD78ADG5YAJSD Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"address":"GDNE5DN....", "transactions":"211", "totalReceived":"0.00174", "totalSent":"0.00547", "freezingTotalAmount":"0.00547", "rewardTotalAmount":"0.00547", "finalBalance":"0.000857"}}
docs.title: Get Address Summary

docs.text: HTTP Method: GET Returns Address, No. of Transactions, Total Received, Total Sent, Freezing Total Amount, Reward Total Amount, Final Balance of Address Query String Explanation Example address public address GDNODE5JKEW8765DHGJASYD78ADG5YAJSD Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"address":"GDNE5DN....", "transactions":"211", "totalReceived":"0.00174", "totalSent":"0.00547", "freezingTotalAmount":"0.00547", "rewardTotalAmount":"0.00547", "finalBalance":"0.000857"}}
docs.title: ‘https://boascan.io/getaddresssummary?address=GHSDNF……'

docs.text: Endpoint ‘https://boascan.io/getblocksummary?block=0x0a8….' HTTP Method: GET Returns Height, Hash, Previous Hash, Merkle Root, Signature, Random Seed, Timestamp, Block Size, Total Reward, Version, No. of Transactions, Transaction Volume, Total Fees, Total Received BOA, Total Sent BOA of block Query String Explanation Example block Block Hash or Block Height 0x0000009230428342374236748234322 or 327556 Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"height":"23423", "timestamp":"2s", "hash":"0x902349....","previousHash":"0x748347...","merkleRoot":"0x093240...","signature":"0x83493.....", "randomSeed":"0x56235....","blockSize":"322","totalReward":"0.08233","version":"0.1","transactions":"211", "transactionVolume":"0.08326","totalFee":"0.000012","totalReceived":"0.000123","totalSent":"0.032423"}}
docs.title: Get Block Summary

docs.text: HTTP Method: GET Returns Height, Hash, Previous Hash, Merkle Root, Signature, Random Seed, Timestamp, Block Size, Total Reward, Version, No. of Transactions, Transaction Volume, Total Fees, Total Received BOA, Total Sent BOA of block Query String Explanation Example block Block Hash or Block Height 0x0000009230428342374236748234322 or 327556 Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"height":"23423", "timestamp":"2s", "hash":"0x902349....","previousHash":"0x748347...","merkleRoot":"0x093240...","signature":"0x83493.....", "randomSeed":"0x56235....","blockSize":"322","totalReward":"0.08233","version":"0.1","transactions":"211", "transactionVolume":"0.08326","totalFee":"0.000012","totalReceived":"0.000123","totalSent":"0.032423"}}
docs.title: ‘https://boascan.io/getblocksummary?block=0x0a8….'

docs.text: Endpoint ‘https://boascan.io/getmaxlatestblocks' HTTP Method: GET Returns Height, Hash, Merkle Root, Signature, Validators. TX Count, Enrollment Count, Timestamp of Blocks Query String Explanation Example - - - Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"height":"23423", "timestamp":"2s", "hash":"0x902349....","merkleRoot":"0x093240...","signature":"0x83493.....","validators":"234","txCount":"123","enrolledCount":"322"}}
docs.title: Get Blocks

docs.text: HTTP Method: GET Returns Height, Hash, Merkle Root, Signature, Validators. TX Count, Enrollment Count, Timestamp of Blocks Query String Explanation Example - - - Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"height":"23423", "timestamp":"2s", "hash":"0x902349....","merkleRoot":"0x093240...","signature":"0x83493.....","validators":"234","txCount":"123","enrolledCount":"322"}}
docs.title: ‘https://boascan.io/getmaxlatestblocks'

docs.text: Endpoint ‘https://boascan.io/gettransactionsummary?transaction=0x00a438... HTTP Method: GET Returns Hash, Input Address, Output Addresses, Time, Amount, Fee, Status, Type, Lock Height, Total Input, Total Output, Data Fees, Transaction Fees, Size, Payload, Inputs(Index, UTXO, Signature, Unlock Age, Bytes), Outputs(Index, UTXO, LockType, Bytes) of Transaction Query String Explanation Example transaction Transaction Hash 0x0a8219f7486cbfj78346y85734758323049dd92398 Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"hash":"0x902349....","inputAddress":"SBRUSIDFHSDFH.....","outputAddress":"JKASJDAKSD....","time":"2021-03-04 09:43","amount":"0.01231","fee":"0.0023","status":"Confirmed","type":"7236","lockHeight":"23242", "totalInput":"0.08234","totalOutput":"0.01231","dataFees":"0.00023423","transactionFee":"0.00233","size":"1331", "payload":"0x0a84385f....","inputs":{"index":"0","utxo":"0xwead93....","signature":"0x07438....","unlockAge":"1235", "bytes":"0xc077b..."}, "outputs":{"index":"1","utxo":"0xwea382...","lockType":"keyHash","bytes":"0xc077b..."}}}
docs.title: Get Transaction Summary

docs.text: HTTP Method: GET Returns Hash, Input Address, Output Addresses, Time, Amount, Fee, Status, Type, Lock Height, Total Input, Total Output, Data Fees, Transaction Fees, Size, Payload, Inputs(Index, UTXO, Signature, Unlock Age, Bytes), Outputs(Index, UTXO, LockType, Bytes) of Transaction Query String Explanation Example transaction Transaction Hash 0x0a8219f7486cbfj78346y85734758323049dd92398 Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"hash":"0x902349....","inputAddress":"SBRUSIDFHSDFH.....","outputAddress":"JKASJDAKSD....","time":"2021-03-04 09:43","amount":"0.01231","fee":"0.0023","status":"Confirmed","type":"7236","lockHeight":"23242", "totalInput":"0.08234","totalOutput":"0.01231","dataFees":"0.00023423","transactionFee":"0.00233","size":"1331", "payload":"0x0a84385f....","inputs":{"index":"0","utxo":"0xwead93....","signature":"0x07438....","unlockAge":"1235", "bytes":"0xc077b..."}, "outputs":{"index":"1","utxo":"0xwea382...","lockType":"keyHash","bytes":"0xc077b..."}}}
docs.title: ‘https://boascan.io/gettransactionsummary?transaction=0x00a438...

docs.text: Endpoint ‘https://boascan.io/getmaxlatesttransactions’ HTTP Method: GET Returns Block Height, Hash, Type, Amount, Fee, Size, Time of Transactions Query String Explanation Example - - - Example Response JSON: {"response":"success","data":{"height":"23423", "timestamp":"2s", "hash":"0x902349....","type":"Freeze","amount":"0.00021","fee":"0.0022","size":"123"}}
